description: Each row contains details for the page sent.

columns.name: MSG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the In Basket message record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PAGE_DETAILS_TEXT
columns.description: Details/message for the page that was sent. (Note that we only store the message of outstanding pages in this column. New page messages are stored in the NOTES column of the IB_NOTES table).
